Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/43rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 8 Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, 47th then normal route on Halsted, due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, 47th then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Vincennes/87th
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Vincennes/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Vincennes/87th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
